Hero.description: I specialize in building modern, responsive websites using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Passionate about UI/UX and creating seamless user experiences.

About.title: About
About.description: I'm a frontend developer with 1.5 years experience working on real-world web projects. I specialize in building clean, scalable interfaces using React and Next.js. Currently expanding towards Full-stack development with Node.js & MongoDB.

freelance_details: Developed responsive websites for various brands and small businesses.
Completed multiple freelance projects using modern web technologies.
business_details: Managed business operations and marketing activities for a live music caf√©.
graduation_details: Graduated with a major in Mechatronics Engineering.
tester_details: Tested features and functionalities of new versions of the IXM system.
Planned and executed test cases, and reported results using Jira.
Built OfficeLinx and Space Calling Extension.

Landing.description: Experienced Frontend Developer with a passion for the Next.js ecosystem. I bridge the gap between design and functionality, building robust web applications with TypeScript and MongoDB to ensure an end-to-end seamless experience.
